name: 100 Seconds to Express Your Feelings
description:
Cupcake has been abandoned by her Hooman, Jammie, one too many times. Mochi and Cookie are failures. You have 100 seconds to share your feelings... through wanton destruction of property!

  • [Arrow keys] or [AWD] for movement and jump.
  • [Q] or [Left Mouse] to swipe attack.
  • [E] or [Right Mouse] to chomp attack. (Only effects food items)

Chomping sweet will give a Sugar Rush. (Double Attack Speed)

Chomping Mushrooms will poison you. (No chomp, 1/2 Attack Speed)

Some objects are tougher than others! How many of your feelings can you share in 100 seconds?
